```{r}
# Data load and prep
rm(list = ls()) 
load('all_v2.RData')

SIC <- subset(all.v2, SIC>=0)
SIC$SIC <- SIC$SIC/2
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

yr2004 <- subset(SIC, id=='pb_20544.2004')

ggplot(yr2004, aes(ymd, SIC, na.rm=TRUE)) +
  stat_summary(geom="line",fun.y="mean") +
  xlab("Date") +
  ylab("Sea Ice Concentration") +
  ggtitle("2004") +
  theme_bw()

```

```{r}
yr2005 <- subset(SIC, year==2005)

ggplot(yr2005, aes(ymd, SIC, color=animal, na.rm=TRUE)) +
  stat_summary(geom="line",fun.y="mean") +
  xlab("Date") +
  ylab("Sea Ice Concentration") +
  ggtitle("2005") +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}

  xlab("Date") +
  ylab("Percent Water") +
  ggtitle("Pct Water within a 10 km Radius of pb_06817 Locations 1 month Before Departure from Ice")+
  theme_bw()
```
